SCTX:
Begin glathelScript

short currentDay
short daysPassed
short glathelMove
short nolore

;if ( menumode == 1 )
;	return
;endif

if ( glathelMove == -1 )
	return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "EB_Unrequited" != 80 )
	return
endif

if ( currentDay == Day )
	Return
endif

Set currentDay to Day
Set daysPassed to ( daysPassed + 1 )
;MessageBox "ADDING DAY TO GLATHEL SCRIPT"

if ( GetPCCell "Vivec, Elven Nations Cornerclub" == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( GetPCCell "Vivec, Hlaalu General Goods" == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( GetDeadCount "glathel" > 0 )
	return
endif

if ( GetDeadCount "gadayn andarys" > 0 )
	return
endif

if ( daysPassed > 10 )
	"glathel"->PositionCell, 175.85, -134.169, -157.704, 270, "Vivec, Hlaalu General Goods"
	set glathelMove to -1
	;MessageBox "SHOULD BE MOVING GLATHEL NOW"
	return
endif


End glathelScript
